headline: Zuora Recognized as a Leader in 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Recurring Billing Applications
summary: REDWOOD CITY, Calif., October 16, 2025--Zuora Inc., a leading monetization platform for modern business, has been positioned by Gartner as a Leader in the Magic Quadrant for Recurring Billing Applications.1 The evaluation was based on specific criteria that analyzed the company’s overall Ability to Execute and Completeness of Vision.

headline: Keeper Security Recognized in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Privileged Access Management
summary: Keeper Security, the leading cybersecurity provider of zero-trust and zero-knowledge Privileged Access Management (PAM) software, today announces that it has been recognized among leading vendors in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Privileged Access Management report.

headline: 2 Safe-and-Steady Stocks to Consider Right Now and 1 We Brush Off
summary: A stock with low volatility can be reassuring, but it doesn’t always mean strong long-term performance. Investors who prioritize stability may miss out on higher-reward opportunities elsewhere.
